children.description: Content rendered inside the page sidebar (e.g. <PageSidebarBody /> (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the page sidebar

isManagedSidebar.description:
If true, manages the sidebar open/close state and there is no need to pass the isSidebarOpen boolean into
the sidebar component or add a callback onSidebarToggle function into the Masthead component

isSidebarOpen.description: Programmatically manage if the sidebar is shown, if isManagedSidebar is set to true in the Page component, this prop is managed
